nodes.text: The helmet featured a targeting laser, vision-plus scanner, audio pickup, broadband antenna and speech scrambler.

The body armor consisted of an Ogygian cloak, impact armor for the neck and chest, a bandoleer with a projectile detonator and ammo pouches, glove spikes, a chest-mounted comlink and a Ubese clan belt-clasp.
The lower body armor was shata leather pants and traditional Ubese boots.
Boushh was an individual who wore this armor. That particular suit was also worn by Leia Organa when attempting to rescue Han Solo from Jabba's Palace.
